# [Neotoma]{.bold .r-fit-text} {.title}

## Neotoma Paleoecology Database

```{r}
#| label: neotoma
knitr::include_graphics("https://www.neotomadb.org/assets/uploads/images/neotoma-og-04-2022.jpg")
```

::: footer
[Neotoma Paleoecology Database](https://www.neotomadb.org/)
:::

## What does Neotoma store?

::: {.incremental}
* **'Raw' Observations** on a variety of different proxies (vertebrates, diatoms, [pollen]{.text-color-highlight-primary}, plant macrofossils, testate amoebae, ostracodes, etc.)
  * [number of identified specimens]{.text-color-highlight-secondary}, minimum number of individuals, presence/absence
  * information about individual specimens, such as elements, specimen ID, or isotopic values
* **Taxon names**
* [**Dates**]{.text-color-highlight-tertiary} (14C, 210Pb, etc.)
* **Age inferences**
* [Derived Variables (e.g July mean temperature, species richness)]{.strike}
* [Image files]{.strike}
:::

## [Neotoma API]{.r-fit-text} {.subtitle .textcenter}

## Neotoma API

Notoma REST [API]{.text-color-highlight-primary} allows to directly send [SQL]{.text-color-highlight-secondary} queries from the Neotoma server.

**SQL** (server) = **S**tructured **Q**uery **L**anguage 

**API** = **A**pplication **P**rogramming **I**nterface
